sentences.sContent: As we go on in intercession we may find that our obedience to God is going to cost other people more than we thought.
sentences.sContent_eng: As we go on in intercession we may find that our obedience to God is going to cost other people more than we thought.
sentences.sCn: 我们代求的时候，会发觉对神的顺服，与别人的得失有极大的关系，这是我们想不到的。

trans.tranOther: when someone talks to a person in authority in order to prevent something bad happening to someone else
